title: Ep 50 | Mia's Recent Surgery, Jase’s Advice to Parents, and Trump Is Great for the Pro-Life Cause!
description:
Jase gives an update on Mia and gives advice on how to handle having a child with a cleft palate. Phil talks about how you truly try to survive during duck season. Al commends all those who are pro-life and try to make a difference with foster care and adoption.

 

https://Preparewithphil.com Save $100 on a 4 Week Emergency Food Kit

 

https://BollandBranch.com Get $50 OFF use PROMO CODE: ROBERTSON

 

See episodes of "Unashamed with Phil Robertson": https://bit.ly/2J4XsiX

 

See clips from Phil's TV show "In the Woods with Phil": https://bit.ly/2PNM6k1

 

To take a FREE 30 Day Trial of Phil's TV show and the rest of BlazeTV: https://www.BlazeTV.com/Phil
